htmlbody:
Summary

Groups working to improve Huntingdon North Ward have been given a share of £55,000 community funding provided by Cambridgeshire County Council working in partnership with Huntingdonshire District Council and the Luminous Group.
As part of the Voice Your Choice project, the County Council asked local people to choose the groups they felt would most benefit their community - and 28 projects have now been given funding.
The funds were allocated at a public meeting. The attendees were confirmed to be local residents. The audience received presentations from community groups and other bidders then voted for their preferred scheme(s). Allocation continued until the nominated funds were exhausted.
